Pre-Game Insights: Charlotte enters the matchup with Phoenix after losing 10 games in a row.
The Hornets are 5-13 in home games.
Charlotte leads the Eastern Conference in rebounding, averaging 45.9 boards.
Moussa Diabate paces the Hornets with 6.8 rebounds.
The Suns are 6-10 in road games.
Phoenix has a 4-2 record in games decided by less than 4 points.
